levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(六)

examples.english: The little girl is eating a delicious chocolate chip cookie.
examples.chinese: 小女孩正在吃一塊美味的巧克力餅乾。

examples.english: Mom is baking many yummy cookies for our party now.
examples.chinese: 媽媽正在為我們的派對烤很多美味的餅乾。

examples.english: They are choosing their favorite cookies from the large plate.
examples.chinese: 他們正在從大盤子裡挑選他們最喜歡的餅乾。

examples.english: We are enjoying our juicy hamburger for lunch.
examples.chinese: 我們正在享用我們多汁的漢堡當午餐。

examples.english: The chef is making a fresh hamburger right now.
examples.chinese: 廚師現在正在做一個新鮮的漢堡。

examples.english: My favorite hamburger is always big and very tasty.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的漢堡總是很大又很好吃。

examples.english: She is swimming in the pool right now.
examples.chinese: 她現在正在游泳池裡游泳。

examples.english: The little fish are swimming in the big tank.
examples.chinese: 小魚們正在大魚缸裡游泳。

examples.english: My friends are swimming happily at the beach.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友們正在海邊開心地游泳。

examples.english: Lily is dancing joyfully to the fun music now.
examples.chinese: 莉莉現在正快樂地隨著好聽的音樂跳舞。

examples.english: The boys are learning a cool new dance for the show.
examples.chinese: 男孩們正在為表演學習一個很酷的新舞蹈。

examples.english: Many people are dancing slowly and gracefully in the hall.
examples.chinese: 很多人正在大廳裡緩慢而優雅地跳舞。

examples.english: The boy is running very fast in the park now.
examples.chinese: 那個男孩現在正在公園裡跑得非常快。

examples.english: The washing machine is running loudly in the laundry room.
examples.chinese: 洗衣機正在洗衣房裡大聲運轉著。

examples.english: Water is running from the faucet into the big bucket.
examples.chinese: 水正從水龍頭流進大水桶裡。

examples.english: The little boy is jumping high on the trampoline.
examples.chinese: 小男孩正在彈簧床上高高地跳著。

examples.english: The girl is jumping over a small puddle carefully.
examples.chinese: 女孩正小心地跳過一個小水窪。

examples.english: My sister is jumping rope quickly in the park.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹正在公園裡快速地跳繩。

examples.english: The little girl is singing her favorite song happily now.
examples.chinese: 這個小女孩現在正開心地唱著她最喜歡的歌。

examples.english: A little bird is singing a sweet song on the tree.
examples.chinese: 一隻小鳥正在樹上唱著甜美的歌。

examples.english: All the students are singing loudly in the music class.
examples.chinese: 所有的學生都在音樂課上大聲地唱歌。

examples.english: A small bird is flying high in the blue sky.
examples.chinese: 一隻小鳥正在藍色的天空中高高飛翔。

examples.english: A big airplane is flying smoothly above the clouds.
examples.chinese: 一架大型飛機正在雲層上方平穩地飛行。

examples.english: My colorful kite is flying fast in the strong wind.
examples.chinese: 我色彩繽紛的風箏正在強風中快速地飛著。

examples.english: I can ride my bike very fast.
examples.chinese: 我可以騎腳踏車騎很快。

examples.english: You can eat the cookies after you finish your homework.
examples.chinese: 你寫完作業後就可以吃餅乾。

examples.english: Apples can be red, green, or yellow.
examples.chinese: 蘋果可以是紅色、綠色或黃色的。

examples.english: My friend has a very cute little cat.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友有一隻非常可愛的小貓。

examples.english: We are having some delicious fruit right now.
examples.chinese: 我們現在正在吃一些美味的水果。

examples.english: The children are having a lot of fun playing games.
examples.chinese: 孩子們玩遊戲玩得很開心。

examples.english: He is riding his red bicycle slowly.
examples.chinese: 他正緩慢地騎著他的紅色腳踏車。

examples.english: She is riding a big brown horse in the park.
examples.chinese: 她正在公園裡騎著一匹大棕馬。

examples.english: The children are riding their bright scooters happily.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正開心地騎著他們鮮豔的滑板車。

examples.english: My dad is driving his red car to the park now.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸現在正開著他的紅色汽車去公園。

examples.english: The bus driver is carefully driving the big bus.
examples.chinese: 那位公車司機正小心地駕駛著那輛大公車。

examples.english: We are driving to the zoo to see the animals.
examples.chinese: 我們正開車去動物園看動物。

examples.english: The children are happily walking to the park.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正開心地走向公園。

examples.english: My dad is walking our dog in the morning.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸正在早上遛我們的狗。

examples.english: We are carefully walking across the busy street.
examples.chinese: 我們正小心地走過這條繁忙的街道。

examples.english: Lily is taking her new toy car to school.
examples.chinese: 莉莉正在把她的新玩具車拿去學校。

examples.english: We always take the MRT to visit our grandma.
examples.chinese: 我們總是搭捷運去拜訪我們的奶奶。

examples.english: Please take a cookie from the plate for your snack.
examples.chinese: 請從盤子裡拿一片餅乾當你的點心。

examples.english: She is writing a letter to her friend now.
examples.chinese: 她現在正在寫信給她的朋友。

examples.english: The famous author is writing a new children's story.
examples.chinese: 這位有名的作家正在寫一個新的兒童故事。

examples.english: Please write down your name and class on the paper.
examples.chinese: 請把你的名字和班級寫在紙上。

examples.english: My friend is studying English to speak better.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友正在學習英文，希望說得更好。

examples.english: My brother is studying his math book right now.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥現在正在讀數學書。

examples.english: They study hard every day to get good grades.
examples.chinese: 他們每天努力學習，為了得到好成績。

examples.english: Lily is doing her math homework right now.
examples.chinese: 莉莉現在正在做她的數學功課。

examples.english: The children are doing a big art project together.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在一起做一個大型美術專案。

examples.english: Mom is doing the laundry for our family today.
examples.chinese: 媽媽今天正在為我們家洗衣服。

examples.english: She is making a beautiful drawing for her friend now.
examples.chinese: 她現在正在為她的朋友畫一幅漂亮的畫。

examples.english: My dad is making a big pizza for our family today.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸今天正在為我們家做一個大披薩。

examples.english: The children are making funny faces in the mirror happily.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在鏡子裡開心地做鬼臉。

examples.english: My little brother is playing a fun board game right now.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟現在正在玩一個有趣的桌遊。

examples.english: Our school team is winning the basketball game happily.
examples.chinese: 我們的校隊正在開心地贏得這場籃球比賽。

examples.english: The children are playing a new running game in the park.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在公園裡玩一個新的跑跑遊戲。

examples.english: My brother is playing an exciting computer game on his laptop.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥正在他的筆記型電腦上玩一個刺激的電腦遊戲。

examples.english: This new computer game is teaching us about animals.
examples.chinese: 這個新的電腦遊戲正在教我們關於動物的知識。

examples.english: Many students are downloading a popular computer game today.
examples.chinese: 很多學生今天正在下載一個受歡迎的電腦遊戲。

examples.english: She is writing a birthday card for her best friend now.
examples.chinese: 她現在正在為她最好的朋友寫一張生日卡片。

examples.english: The children are playing with their new playing cards now.
examples.chinese: 孩子們現在正在玩他們的新撲克牌。

examples.english: He is showing his library card to the librarian at the desk.
examples.chinese: 他正在向櫃檯的圖書館員出示他的借書證。

examples.english: My sister is practicing the piano in her room right now.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐現在正在房間裡練習鋼琴。

examples.english: Workers are moving a new piano into the music hall.
examples.chinese: 工人正在把一架新鋼琴搬進音樂廳。

examples.english: The little girl is excitedly pointing at the piano.
examples.chinese: 小女孩正興奮地指著那架鋼琴。

examples.english: My brother is playing a happy song on his new guitar.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥正在用他的新吉他彈奏一首快樂的歌。

examples.english: The girl is holding a small brown guitar in her hands.
examples.chinese: 那個女孩正用她的雙手拿著一把小小的棕色吉他。

examples.english: He is learning to play the guitar with his music teacher.
examples.chinese: 他正在和他的音樂老師學習彈吉他。

examples.english: My sister is singing a beautiful song right now.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐現在正在唱一首很美的歌曲。

examples.english: I heard a bird's sweet song outside my window this morning.
examples.chinese: 今天早上我聽到窗外有小鳥甜美的歌聲。

examples.english: What is your favorite English song to listen to?
examples.chinese: 你最喜歡聽哪一首英文歌曲？

examples.english: She is kicking a colorful ball in the park.
examples.chinese: 她正在公園裡踢一顆彩色的球。

examples.english: The happy boy is bouncing a red basketball.
examples.chinese: 那個開心的男孩正在拍打一顆紅色的籃球。

examples.english: My cute dog is chasing a fluffy tennis ball.
examples.chinese: 我的可愛狗狗正在追逐一顆毛茸茸的網球。

examples.english: We are playing baseball in the park now.
examples.chinese: 我們現在正在公園裡打棒球。

examples.english: The pitcher is throwing a fast baseball.
examples.chinese: 那位投手正丟著一顆很快的棒球。

examples.english: Many people are watching an exciting baseball game.
examples.chinese: 許多人正在觀看一場精彩的棒球比賽。

examples.english: We are playing basketball together at school today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天正在學校一起打籃球。

examples.english: He is bouncing the new orange basketball very high.
examples.chinese: 他正把那顆新橘色籃球拍得很高。

examples.english: My family is watching an exciting basketball game on TV.
examples.chinese: 我的家人正在電視上看一場刺激的籃球比賽。

examples.english: The children are playing soccer happily on the field right now.
examples.chinese: 孩子們現在正在球場上快樂地踢足球。

examples.english: Soccer is a very popular sport for kids in many countries.
examples.chinese: 足球在許多國家是一種很受孩子們歡迎的運動。

examples.english: My brother watches an exciting soccer match on TV every Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥每個星期六都會在電視上看一場刺激的足球比賽。

examples.english: The boy is happily flying a colorful kite in the park.
examples.chinese: 這個男孩正在公園裡快樂地放著一個彩色的風箏。

examples.english: My sister is carefully drawing designs on her new kite.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹正在仔細地在她的新風箏上畫圖案。

examples.english: We are watching many bright kites gracefully flying high in the blue sky.
examples.chinese: 我們正在看許多明亮的風箏優雅地在高空中飛翔。

examples.english: The little girl is happily holding her favorite doll.
examples.chinese: 小女孩開心地抱著她最喜歡的娃娃。

examples.english: My new doll has very pretty blue eyes.
examples.chinese: 我的新娃娃有非常漂亮的藍眼睛。

examples.english: My sister is making new clothes for her doll.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐正在為她的娃娃做新衣服。

examples.english: Colorful flowers are opening now because spring is here.
examples.chinese: 五顏六色的花朵現在正在綻放，因為春天來了。

examples.english: Many animals are waking up as spring is making the weather warmer.
examples.chinese: 許多動物正在醒來，因為春天正在讓天氣變暖和。

examples.english: Children are playing outside happily while spring is bringing sunny days.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在外面快樂地玩耍，因為春天正帶來晴朗的日子。

examples.english: This summer, we are planning a fun trip to the beach.

examples.chinese: 這個夏天，我們正計畫一個去海灘的有趣旅行。

examples.english: Many students are enjoying their long summer vacation now.

examples.chinese: 很多學生現在正在享受他們的漫長暑假。

examples.english: The cicadas are singing loudly every hot summer afternoon.

examples.chinese: 每一個炎熱的夏日午後，蟬都在大聲歌唱。

examples.english: In fall, the leaves are turning red and yellow.
examples.chinese: 秋天的時候，樹葉正在變紅變黃。

examples.english: People are enjoying the cool air in fall.
examples.chinese: 人們在秋天正在享受涼爽的空氣。

examples.english: Many families are picking apples in fall.
examples.chinese: 許多家庭在秋天正在採蘋果。

examples.english: It is winter now, and the air is getting colder.
examples.chinese: 現在是冬天，空氣越來越冷了。

examples.english: Many people are wearing warm coats in winter.
examples.chinese: 在冬天，很多人都穿著暖和的厚外套。

examples.english: The snowy mountains are looking beautiful this winter.
examples.chinese: 今年冬天，那些雪山看起來很美。

examples.english: The sun is shining brightly in the sky right now.
examples.chinese: 太陽現在正在天空中閃耀著光芒。

examples.english: We are feeling the warm sun on our faces today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天正在臉上感受到溫暖的太陽。

examples.english: The sun is slowly setting in the west right now.
examples.chinese: 太陽現在正慢慢地在西方落下。

examples.english: The full moon is looking beautiful in the night sky.
examples.chinese: 滿月在夜空中看起來很美。

examples.english: The bright moon is rising slowly above the trees.
examples.chinese: 明亮的月亮正在樹林上方緩緩升起。

examples.english: A small cloud is covering the shiny moon tonight.
examples.chinese: 今晚一小片雲正在遮住閃亮的月亮。

examples.english: Look! The stars are shining brightly in the dark night sky.
examples.chinese: 看！星星在漆黑的夜空中閃耀著。

examples.english: She is always shining like a star in her dance class.
examples.chinese: 她在舞蹈課上總是像一顆閃耀的星星。

examples.english: The teacher is drawing a big star on the board right now.
examples.chinese: 老師現在正在黑板上畫一顆大星星。

examples.english: Look! It is raining gently outside right now.
examples.chinese: 看！外面正在下著小雨。

examples.english: The children are playing happily in the light rain.
examples.chinese: 孩子們正在細雨中快樂地玩耍。

examples.english: After the heavy rain, the air feels cool and fresh.
examples.chinese: 大雨過後，空氣感覺涼爽清新。

examples.english: It is feeling very hot outside right now.
examples.chinese: 現在外面感覺非常熱。

examples.english: Mommy is making hot soup for dinner.
examples.chinese: 媽媽正在煮熱湯當晚餐。

examples.english: He is saying the chili noodles are really hot.
examples.chinese: 他正在說這個辣麵真的很辣。

examples.english: It is very cold today, so wear a warm jacket when you go out.
examples.chinese: 今天很冷，所以你出門時要穿暖和的外套。

examples.english: My little sister has a bad cold and is staying home from school now.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹得了重感冒，現在正在家裡休息，沒去學校。

examples.english: Do you want some cold juice or just plain water to drink?
examples.chinese: 你想要喝點冰果汁還是普通的開水呢？

examples.english: It is a beautiful sunny day today, perfect for playing outside.
examples.chinese: 今天真是個晴朗的好天氣，很適合在外面玩耍。

examples.english: Our new classroom is very sunny and bright in the morning.
examples.chinese: 我們的新教室早上很晴朗明亮。

examples.english: The flowers are growing beautifully in the sunny part of the garden.
examples.chinese: 花兒在花園晴朗的區域裡長得很漂亮。

examples.english: It is a rainy day today, so we are playing inside.
examples.chinese: 今天是下雨天，所以我們正在室內玩。

examples.english: The spring in Taiwan is often rainy and a little cold.
examples.chinese: 台灣的春天常常是下雨的，而且有點冷。

examples.english: We wear raincoats when it is rainy outside to stay dry.
examples.chinese: 外面下雨的時候，我們會穿雨衣保持身體乾燥。

examples.english: The sky is looking cloudy today, so bring an umbrella.
examples.chinese: 今天天空看起來多雲，所以請帶雨傘。

examples.english: The weather is slowly getting cloudy this afternoon.
examples.chinese: 今天下午天氣正慢慢變得多雲。

examples.english: The sky is becoming cloudy now, perfect for a cool walk.
examples.chinese: 天空現在正變得多雲，非常適合涼爽地散步。

examples.english: It is windy outside right now, so our clothes are blowing.
外面現在風很大，所以我們的衣服在飄動。
We are flying kites happily because it is a very windy day.
我們正在高興地放風箏，因為今天風很大。
We are feeling chilly now because it is quite windy on the hill.
我們現在感到有點冷，因為山丘上風很大。
The spring air feels warm and pleasant.
examples.chinese: 春天的空氣感覺暖和又舒服。

examples.english: The cat is sleeping on a warm blanket.
examples.chinese: 那隻貓正在睡在暖和的毯子上。

examples.english: Drinking a cup of warm milk helps me sleep.
examples.chinese: 喝一杯暖和的牛奶可以幫助我睡覺。

examples.english: The wind feels cool on my face right now.
examples.chinese: 風吹在我臉上感覺涼涼的。

examples.english: Your new bicycle looks really cool and fast.
examples.chinese: 你的新腳踏車看起來很酷又很快。

examples.english: It is cool to learn English with my friends.
examples.chinese: 和我的朋友一起學英文很酷。

examples.english: Look! The weather is changing, it's getting cloudy now.
examples.chinese: 看！天氣正在變化，現在變得多雲了。

examples.english: I hope the weather will be good for our picnic this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我希望這週末野餐時天氣會很好。

examples.english: This hot weather makes me want to drink a lot of cold water.
examples.chinese: 這種熱天氣讓我想喝很多冰水。

examples.english: Who is wearing the blue jacket in the picture?
examples.chinese: 照片裡誰正穿著藍色夾克？

examples.english: Who is holding the big red ball now?
examples.chinese: 誰現在正拿著那個大紅球？

examples.english: She is the student who is singing a beautiful song.
examples.chinese: 她就是那個正在唱優美歌曲的學生。

examples.english: What are you doing in the park right now?
examples.chinese: 你現在正在公園裡做什麼？

examples.english: What kind of music are you listening to?
examples.chinese: 你正在聽什麼樣的音樂？

examples.english: What a surprising gift you are giving me!
examples.chinese: 你送我一個多麼令人驚訝的禮物啊！

examples.english: When it is raining, I am reading a fun book.
examples.chinese: 當下雨的時候，我正在讀一本有趣的書。

examples.english: When the sun is setting, the sky is turning orange.
examples.chinese: 當太陽下山的時候，天空正在變成橘色。

examples.english: When I am drawing, my friend is singing a sweet song.
examples.chinese: 當我正在畫畫的時候，我的朋友正在唱一首甜美的歌。
